share.linkCopiedDescription: The event link has been copied to your clipboard.
share.errorDescription: Could not share the event. Please try again.

metadata.title: About EventMaple - Manage your events intelligently
metadata.description: Discover how EventMaple helps the community manage events and personalized agendas efficiently and for free.

header.title: About EventMaple
header.subtitle: A project created with passion to help the community manage their events

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text1: EventMaple was born with a clear and simple purpose: to empower the community to create, organize, and participate in events of any kind, completely free and accessible to everyone.
mission.text2: Whether it's a tech event, a conference, a community workshop, or any other type of gathering, EventMaple gives you the tools you need for both organizers and attendees to manage all information in one place.

items.0: Create events of any kind, tech or non-tech
items.1: Add talks, workshops, and activities within each event
items.2: Share all event information with the community

items.0: Explore events and discover talks that interest you
items.1: Manage your personal event agenda tailored to you
items.2: Mark talks and activities you want to attend
items.3: Keep everything organized in one place, for multiple events

vision.title: Made for the Community
vision.text1: EventMaple is designed with you and the whole community in mind. We believe managing events shouldn't be complicated or expensive. That's why we offer a completely free platform that puts the power of organization in your hands.
vision.text2: Whether you're an organizer looking to facilitate your attendees' experience, or a participant wanting to make the most of every event, EventMaple is here to help you keep everything structured, accessible, and under control.
vision.highlight: üí° Our vision: A world where any person or group can organize and participate in events simply, intuitively, and effectively, strengthening community ties and facilitating access to shared knowledge and experiences.

community.title: Community First
community.desc: Everything we do is designed to serve and empower the community

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.desc: An easy-to-use, intuitive, and accessible tool for everyone

free.title: Always Free
free.desc: We believe in free access to knowledge and digital tools

cta.title: Ready to Start?
cta.text: Join EventMaple and start managing your events intelligently

metadata.title: Contact - EventMaple
metadata.description: Get in touch with us for questions, suggestions, or feedback.

header.title: Contact
header.subtitle: Have questions, suggestions, or just want to chat? I'd love to hear from you!

Contact.intro: Hi! üëã I'm Edwar, the developer behind EventMaple. I created this project with the goal of helping the community manage events more efficiently and accessibly.

github.title: GitHub
github.desc: Check out my projects and code

portfolio.title: Web Portfolio
portfolio.desc: Learn more about my work and experience

aboutProject.title: About the Project
aboutProject.text: EventMaple is an open-source project created to help the community manage events efficiently. If you have ideas, find a bug, or want to contribute, your feedback is welcome!

idea.title: üí° Have an idea?
idea.desc: Share your suggestions to improve EventMaple

bug.title: üêõ Found a bug?
bug.desc: Help me improve by reporting any issues

collab.title: ü§ù Want to collaborate?
collab.desc: I'm always open to collaborations and contributions

questions.title: üìù Have questions?
questions.desc: Don't hesitate to contact me for any inquiries

cta.title: Thanks for using EventMaple!
cta.text: Your support and feedback are fundamental to improving this platform

Metadata.title: EventMaple - The smartest way to organize your event
Metadata.description: Manage your events, agenda, and notifications in one place.

Hero.title: The smartest way to organize your event.
Hero.subtitle: Your event agenda, simplified. Manage and enjoy every moment without complications.
Hero.subtitleMobile: Create your event agenda, get notifications and don't miss any activity.

Benefits.title: Key Benefits
Benefits.subtitle: Discover the advantages of using our platform for an unmatched event experience.

time.title: Save Time
time.description: Optimize your time with our intuitive scheduling tools and create a calendar.

organized.title: Stay Organized
organized.description: Keep everything in order and don't miss any important session or event.

Features.title: Main Features
Features.subtitle: Explore the features that make our app the best option for your event.

agenda.title: Personalized Agenda
agenda.description: Create and manage your own personalized agenda with the sessions that interest you most.

notifications.title: Real-Time Notifications
notifications.description: Receive instant updates and reminders about your sessions and event changes.

maps.title: Event Maps
maps.description: Navigate the event venue with our interactive maps and find your way easily.

brand.tagline: The smartest way to organize your event.
